title: Audio and frame drops after patch 6.5, Macbook Pro
body:
Not sure where I should be directing this, but I assume here is fine.

 After the latest patch, I've noticed (as well as a couple of friends) that there are significant frame/audio drops within the game when there are larger scale team fights. Everyone who is experiencing the problem that I know of is playing on an Apple computer. Thought I could bring this to the attention of someone if it has not already been done.

This is not due to our system specs, as before patch 6.5 everything was fine and worked smoothly. Are there many other people finding this problem?

replies.body: This happens to me as well. It's only since the recent patches. I'm on a Windows 10 machine.
